text: Lindsey Meadows (born 15 December 1982) is an American born Dutch softball player.Profile at dutchsoftballteam.com She plays in the Dutch league with Tex Town Tigers. After playing her 400th match in the Dutch league she was decorated with the softball federation insignia. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team since June 2010. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. Meadows studied at the Louisiana Tech University, holding a Bachelors Degree in sociology. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:Sportswomen Category:Sportspeople from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
title: Lindsey Meadows
